parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Specifies the logic to pull back a subset of records.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Specifies the values used to sort the collection of entries.

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: Specifies aggregation behavior for the collection of entries.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The $select system query option allows the clients to requests a limited set of properties for each entry.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Specifies the subset of entries by count.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Indicates the related entities to be represented inline. The default maximum depth is 2.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Specifies the count of entries to skip.

parameters.name: $compute
parameters.description: Specifies computed properties that can be used in $select, $filter or $orderby expressions.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not to include a total entry count.
